parameters.name: BackupDbNames
parameters.description:
The databases to be backed up. Separate multiple databases with commas (,).

>  This parameter takes effect only when the backup level is database level.

parameters.name: BackupLevel
parameters.description:
The level of the backup. Valid values:

*   db: The database type.
*   instance: instance

parameters.name: BackupLog
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable log Backup. Valid values:

*   1: enabled.
*   0: disabled.

parameters.name: BackupMode
parameters.description:
The backup mode. Valid values:

*   **Logic **: logical backup
*   **phy**: physical backup

parameters.name: DataBackupRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The retention period of the backup data. Value range: 7 to 730.

parameters.name: LogBackupRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The log retention period. Valid values: 7 to 730. This value must be less than or equal to the number of data backup days.

parameters.name: PreferredBackupEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the backup.

parameters.name: PreferredBackupPeriod
parameters.description:
The backup cycle. Valid values:

*   0: Monday
*   1: Tuesday
*   2: Wednesday
*   3: Thursday
*   4: Friday
*   5: Saturday
*   6: Sunday

parameters.name: PreferredBackupStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the backup.
